HRNN_Wmultitask_16_opp2: increase number of features map and lstm_n_hidden
    
RCNN_Wmultitask_16_opp2: increase number of features map and lstm_n_hidden

RCNN_Wmultitask_16_opp3: decrease number of features map and lstm_n_hidden

HRNN_NewWavelet_Wmultitask_16_opp_20K_2: same as RCNN_Wmultitask_16_opp2
